c74object.name: abc.hoa.encoder~
c74object.description:
abc.hoa.encoder~ is a 2D High Order Ambisonics (HOA) encoder.
This object enable to create punctual sources either in rotation at a certain speed or static and located at a precise angle (in degrees) on the ambisonic circle.

objarg.name: ambisonic-order
objarg.digest: The ambisonic order of the decorrelation process
objarg.description: First argument is the ambisonic order [init=1, min=1, max=7, step=1].

method.name: angle
method.description: set the angle of the encoded signal in degree [init=0:min=-360:max=360:step=0.01].
method.digest: set the angle of the encoded signal in degree

method.name: speed
method.description: set the rotation speed of the encoded signal in turn/s [init=0:min=-100:max=100:step=0.001].
method.digest: set the angle of the encoded signal in degree

method.name: returntime
method.description: set the return time in ms of the encoded source to come back to intial position after rotation speed goes back to 0 [init=20:min=0:max=1000:step=1].
method.digest: set the angle of the encoded signal in degree
